pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Open Traffic Generator Abstract Python Package[![Build](https://github.com/open-traffic-generator/abstract-python-package/workflows/Build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/open-traffic-generator/abstract-python-package/actions)[![pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/abstract-open-traffic-generator.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/abstract-open-traffic-generator)[![python](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/abstract-open-traffic-generator.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/abstract-open-traffic-generator)[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIT_License)This package is an autogenerated abstract python package based on the Open Traffic Generator models.
